Name: Toy Rider
About the game: Toy Rider is a car racing game, what makes it different from a typical car racing game is, it is not just about speed it is about balancing, timing, proper use of power-ups & proper speed! The game is inspired by the Table Top Racing & Micromachine game but with lots of upgrades and improvements. One of the best racing game Racing Game Features : - Miniature home environment graphics - 100+ Unique Cars - 10 crazy power-ups - 24+ race tracks - Off road racing - Play offline (no wifi required racing game) - Lot's of rewards & gifts - Customize and upgrade your cars - Sports cars, F1 racers, Monster trucks, Planes & more - Race with planes & helicopter - Race with Kart & buggy cars - Lots of Cars 2 unlock - Fast Car games action - Crash of cars - Fast & Furious action adventure - Real car driving experience - Best racing game for girls - Arcade racing Themes : - Bedroom (various bedroom tracks to play with) - Kitchen (various kitchen tracks to play with) - Bathroom (various bathroom tracks to play with) - Beach Track (various beach levels to play with) Power-ups : - Fireball Attack (make your opponent's wheels go hot) - Freeze ball attack (make your opponent go ice) - Nitros boost (nitro boost racing) - Slow down (slow your opponent's car) - Summon Bull (turn your car into a raging bull) - Summon Horse (turn your car into a Horse to beat your opponent) - Summon Tank (turn your car into a military tank) - Call the police (call the police and they will catch other racers) - Call the Kid (call the crazy boy racer to irritate your opponents) - Call JohnWick (call him and he will make sure you will win) Cars : - Casual cars - Supercars - Traffic Rider cars - John wick cars - Monster trucks - F1 racing cars - Planes & helicopters - And many more super fun cars to unlock Note: We tried to create the best possible car racing gaming experience, so if you like it then please download and don't forget to leave your valuable feedback as comments, Thank you!
